titleStmt.title: In effigiem Mariæ Reginæ, Jacob. Magni. Reg. matris I. Gordonius.
titleStmt.author: Gordon, John, 1544-1619.

notesStmt.note: Engraved port. of Mary, Queen of Scots, with Latin verse, enclosed in ornamental border.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
